title: Motown switches to festive gear with new models
description: Carmakers are preparing to launch 20 new passenger vehicle models in India by the end of October, despite sluggish sales and high dealer inventory. This major product offensive is aimed at revitalizing the market during the upcoming festival season. Among the new releases, 12 will be entirely new offerings.
